about.title: About
paragraphs: I'm a frontend developer based in Spain, specializing in creating modern, efficient web experiences. With a background in Web and Multiplatform Development, I combine solid technical knowledge with a minimalist aesthetic approach.

My passion for automation and clean code allows me to deliver solutions that not only look exceptional but perform flawlessly. I focus on creating digital experiences that are both beautiful and functional.

projects.title: Hearinit Platform
projects.description: Modern platform connecting users with certified audiologists and trusted hearing centers. Accessible design focused on personalized advice, expert access, and continuous support.
projects.longDescription: Hearinit is a modern platform designed to seamlessly connect individuals with certified audiologists and trusted hearing centers. Its core mission is to provide an accessible and intuitive experience, ensuring every user receives personalized guidance for their hearing health. The platform emphasizes universal accessibility, allowing anyone to navigate effortlessly while accessing tailored recommendations.
features: User-friendly navigation and clear information architecture
Interactive forms for user contact and appointment requests
Optimized performance for fast loading times
Integration with maps for locating partner centers
SEO optimization for higher search engine visibility

projects.title: NPM Package
projects.description: CLI tool that instantly sets up modern frontend projects with Vue + Tailwind or Astro + Tailwind.
projects.longDescription: Designed and developed an interactive analytics dashboard to visualize key business metrics. The frontend was built with Astro for optimal performance and SEO, while data processing and automated reporting were handled by Python scripts. Utilized Chart.js for dynamic and customizable data visualizations, providing actionable insights to stakeholders. The dashboard is designed for easy integration with various data sources.
features: Project scaffolding with Astro and Tailwind CSS integration
Responsive design structure out of the box
Seamless integration with GitHub for version control

projects.title: Bite & Smash
projects.description: Designed and developed Bite & Smash's website to showcase their menu and highlight their unique burger concept.
projects.longDescription: I designed and developed the website for Bite & Smash, a modern burger restaurant, with a strong focus on showcasing their menu and emphasizing their unique culinary identity. The site was crafted to reflect the brand's bold personality, using vibrant visuals and a clean layout to highlight signature dishes, ingredients, and the restaurant's smash-style cooking concept. The result is an engaging digital presence that elevates their brand and enhances the customer experience online.
features: Optimized image loading and asset delivery

values.title: Clarity
values.description: I believe in building solutions with absolute clarity, from the first line of code to the final deployment. This means writing clean, well-documented code that is easy to understand and maintain. Equally important is transparent and consistent communication with clients, ensuring everyone is aligned and informed throughout every stage of the project.

values.title: Efficiency
values.description: Efficiency is at the core of my development process. I strive to deliver optimized solutions that not only perform flawlessly but are also scalable and maintainable in the long run. This involves choosing the right tools, streamlining workflows, and automating repetitive tasks to ensure maximum impact with minimal overhead.

values.title: Purposeful Design
values.description: Design is not just about how something looks, but how it works. My approach to design is purposeful, ensuring that every visual element and interaction serves a clear function. I craft aesthetics that enhance usability and elevate the user experience, creating digital products that are both beautiful and intuitively functional.
